item.title: A Little About Me and My Story
item.description: Hi there. My name is Alloysius Goh. I am a student in Ngee Ann Polytechnic, Singapore, studying Information Security & Forensics. So why have I created this blog like thing? I do not know actually. Maybe I want to document some of the things I find interesting? Maybe document some experiences from my journey so that I can look back? Or maybe I just want a place to pen my thoughts and rant about stuff.
